lines.text: You might say it was a "smashing" failure! And by the way, as a computer, you stink!
Who said I was a computer? I'm a automatic pop-up toaster, and I'll prove it.
[Covers the aardvark in a pile of toast]

[breaking the fourth wall]
Anybody got a pound of butter?

[after the aardvark sprays himself in the face with bug spray]
Man, he must be having a bad trip.
